data.actual_result: The text box gets wider and the text fits into one line, but the text box still has the same hight
data.expected_result: The text box gets wider and thinner, because the text fits into one line
data.short_description: Text box height does not adjust
data.steps_to_repro: - Have the search results or member list open - Type something in the text box until you get a new line - Close the search results/member list -
